strings.Value: "This fog... it's here for a reason. I've seen much subterfuge, hearing cases at Kyonin's courts. I don't know how these dimwit bandits managed to do it, but they use the fog to hide their trails."
"Maybe the fog has nothing to do with the bandits, and has a completely different origin?"
"No matter where it came from, we won't be able to leave these lands until it clears away."
"Hah. I doubt they could afford to hire a wizard capable of such magic."
